{{Description|A sacred blade indwelt with great enough reason and will to create and destroy a universe, or a dream.}}
'''Sword of Narzissenkreuz''' is a quest exclusive weapon that appears during the {{Quest|Waking from the Great Dream (Quest)}}

It replaces [[Holy Blade of Narzissenkreuz (Search in the Algae Sea)|Holy Blade of Narzissenkreuz]] and upon completion of {{Quest|Rowboat's Wake (Quest)}} is itself replaced by [[Sword of Narzissenkreuz]].
